name: Dicey (RicoTV)
description:
My entry to GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Dicey - This is at the heart a math's puzzle game based on the faces of a 6 sided dice. 

I design it with the player having a pen and paper at hand as it is intentially not very giving. Although the solving portion I note instead of 3 tries I accidentally gave punters a free extra go.

I have had a little slump in my Gamedev journey and found the 2 day pressure tough, still I made something and I am happy to share it for feedback.

If I had more time besides fixing little bugs, I would like to add more juice, sfx and music. As I am now heading to bed and these things are front of mind but nearly 1 am Kiwi time - I think I will let myself call it.
